items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Stunning Dress!
items.body: I was so impressed with this dress! The quality is excellent for the price â€” the fabric feels soft yet structured, and it fits true to size. Itâ€™s super flattering and comfortable to wear all day. Perfect for weddings, date nights, or any special occasion. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: p.swag

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So happy with this purchase!
items.body: I am 5'7" about 150 and more fit than not and this dress could have not fit more perfectly! I got so many compliments on this dress that I wore to a Midwest Fall wedding. I added gold jewelry to it (necklace, bracelet and earrings) and it was perfect for the event. I am hoping I have another opportunity to wear it again. Definitely would buy this dress again. Read more
items.author: AngelaH

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and nice fit. Use the sizing chart at the bottom though (not the top).
items.body: This dress is classy-looking and very soft and comfortable. The inner lining is very smooth and soft against your skin. The fit was exactly what I was hoping for. I got the small based off the second sizing chart measurements (use the one at the bottom of the page--the one at the top is way off!) For reference, I'm 36" x 29" x 36". Although the waist measurement says 26.5'' - 28", it's not too tight at 29". The length is good, as well. Sits a little above my ankles and I'm 5'5''. The arms are sheer, which is a nice touch and gives it some character. The neckline part is just a little weird, but not too much to be overly noticeable or prevent me from wearing it. I washed it on delicate and laid it over a soft chair to dry--it was too heavy wet to hang dry with my clips. But it held up just fine after washing. Read more
items.author: Nicole

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly awesome
items.body: I wore this dress to a black tie event and received tons of looks and compliments. I got it in black. Im 5â€™2 143lbs, 34C - I had to order in a medium and Xsmall because the small wouldnâ€™t arrive in time. The medium fit fine but the sleeves were a tiny bit too loose for me. Xsmall was tight but still fit good, after a couple of hours of wearing it, it fit perfect. The neck part is really pretty. The right shoulder is kind of cinched causing these (3) pretty folds that go across the chest. Looked very classy. I wasnâ€™t sure about the cinching in the back, to me itâ€™s kind of trashy. BUT the dress did look great and all the compliments made me feel like the cinching in the back is fine. Paired with a nice clutch and pretty heels, this dress will look expensive. Read more
items.author: Jenna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excelent
items.body: Excellent, the dress is as described in the application, I recommend Read more
items.author: Vane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooths beautifully with a natural feel
items.body: This dress is soft and stretchy which makes it easy to put on and comfortable to wear for long periods. It smooths everything without feeling tight or restrictive. The fabric feels breathable and the fit is flattering. A really nice everyday piece. Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty & Comfortable
items.body: Like all dresses of this nature, this one is very form-fitted. It's very stretchy too and will be comfortable to wear. It's made well too. I love the style of the dress with the see-through sleeves and look forward to wearing it to a wedding later this fall. Read more
items.author: WendyJRB

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Ruched Bodycon Formal Cocktail Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Ruched Bodycon Formal Cocktail Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blackfloral, Wine, Brown, Brownprint, Navy, White, Goldfloral, Black, Brownfloral, Bluefloral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
